name: Morter Bounce Ultra 2K20
description:
Made for Trijam 80 "What goes up must come down"

Prevent the invaders from touching the green line

a/d or left/right arrows to move your tank

space to fire (on a 1 second cooldown, no UI indicator for that)

Shots will bounce off of blocks and walls, destroying themselves and invaders on impact.

Your own shots can also cause damage, don't let them touch the green line.

All audio is taken from creative commons sources:

Music is 'Kinetic Sands' by Azureflux 

Sound effects from:

https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/341702/

https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/404769/
